cons: Pay is minimum wage, but with as cheap as tuition is, that isn't all that bad. As a student worker on campus security, one does get treated worse than trash. The faculty is exceptionally arrogant, pompous, and all you can do is act like you want to be polite to them (builds character). The rest of the students don't want to listen to you either, so they treat the department like a joke. With the God's help, and the right attitude, you can make it passed all of the hypocritical faculty, and the cocky students though.

review_title: Great first job right out of college
pros: The college is a great place to start working right after you graduate. They provide cheap housing, good food, and good insurance.
cons: They hide behind the guise of a "ministry" to keep their pay low and impose strict rules on the personal lives of their workers. They are not employee focused and do not have an issue with getting rid of  a good employee if a specific administration member gets his feelings hurt or feels that his "authority" is being questioned. They have an never ending supply of fresh graduates to fill in for those who leave due to these issues so they don't feel that they need to address them.
